title: Dejan Mitrović
text:
Dejan Mitrović (<a href="Serbian%20Cyrillic">Serbian Cyrillic</a>: Дејан Митровић; born February 2, 1973) is a retired <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Career.
After playing with <a href="OFK%20Beograd">OFK Beograd</a> still a youngster, he will move in 1992 to Belgium where he will spend most of his career. After playing initially with a minor club Nijlen, he moved in 1994 to <a href="FC%20Kapellen">FC Kapellen</a> and will play afterwards for several other Belgian clubs, such as <a href="Belgian%20First%20Division">Belgian First Division</a> clubs <a href="KVC%20Westerlo">KVC Westerlo</a>, <a href="R.E.%20Mouscron">R.E. Mouscron</a> and, later on, with <a href="Royal%20Antwerp%20FC">Royal Antwerp FC</a> and lower league <a href="KFC%20Lille">KFC Lille</a>. In between, he will also have spells in Cyprus, with <a href="Anorthosis%20Famagusta">Anorthosis Famagusta</a> and <a href="Anagennisi%20Dherynia">Anagennisi Dherynia</a>, and in Portugal, with <a href="C.F.%20Uni%C3%A3o">C.F. União</a> from <a href="Madeira">Madeira</a>.
